name: part_002
file: tmp_【#癒月ちょこ4周年LIVE】ちょこから感謝を込めて4周年3ＤLIVE‼【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [XKBbbN7M44E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Choco thanks the viewers and introduces the next part of the live.
Performance of the song 'Koakuma Datte Kamawanai!' with Takane Lui.

subtitles.original: どうしたって
subtitles.english: No matter what,

subtitles.original: 何したって
subtitles.english: no matter what I do,

subtitles.original: 気持ちは同じなんだね
subtitles.english: our feelings are the same, aren't they?

subtitles.original: ここだって
subtitles.english: Even here,

subtitles.original: どこだって
subtitles.english: even everywhere,

subtitles.original: 思いは伝わるから
subtitles.english: my thoughts will reach you.

subtitles.original: 声にして
subtitles.english: Give it a voice,

subtitles.original: 文字にして
subtitles.english: put it in writing,

subtitles.original: 勇気出して「好き」って伝えてよ
subtitles.english: take courage and tell me "I love you."

subtitles.original: 今日だって
subtitles.english: Even today,

subtitles.original: いつだって
subtitles.english: even always,

subtitles.original: あぁ 愛し返すの
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll love you back.

subtitles.original: 隠さないで ちゃんと教えて
subtitles.english: Don't hide it, tell me properly.

subtitles.original: 君のこと 全部を
subtitles.english: Everything about you...

subtitles.original: ちょうだい
subtitles.english: Give it to me.

subtitles.original: 今 会いたいの 飛んでって
subtitles.english: I want to see you now, fly to me.

subtitles.original: 少し困るくらいに おねだり
subtitles.english: Be a little troublesome and beg.

subtitles.original: 高鳴る心 聞いてみて
subtitles.english: Listen to my racing heart.

subtitles.original: 感じてほしいの
subtitles.english: I want you to feel it.

subtitles.original: 会いたいはすぐ 飛んでって
subtitles.english: The "I want to see you" will fly immediately.

subtitles.original: 少し困るくらいに おねだり
subtitles.english: Be a little troublesome and beg.

subtitles.original: めちゃときめいて 受け取って
subtitles.english: Be super thrilled and receive it.

subtitles.original: 甘くとろけちゃうような時間を
subtitles.english: A time that feels like it's melting sweetly...

subtitles.original: 隣にいたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to be by your side.

subtitles.original: みんなー！今日は来てくれてありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thank you for coming today!

subtitles.original: どうも、癒月ちょこ活動4周年記念ライブ、
subtitles.english: Hello, I'm Yuzuki Choco, thank you for watching

subtitles.original: 見ていただいて、みんな、盛り上がってるー！？
subtitles.english: my 4th anniversary live, is everyone getting excited!?

subtitles.original: いや、オープニングはね、ちょこ、ちょこのね、
subtitles.english: Well, for the opening, Choco...

subtitles.original: オリ曲2曲、歌っちゃったんだけど、
subtitles.english: I sang two of my original songs,

subtitles.original: どうだった？やっぱちょこのオリ曲、
subtitles.english: how was it? Everyone likes Choco's original songs,

subtitles.original: みんな好きだよね？ちょこは大好き。
subtitles.english: right? Choco loves them.

subtitles.original: はい、ということでね、今回は、歌ライブ。
subtitles.english: Yes, so, this time it's a singing live.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、前回味しめて、2回目やっちゃおうかなーと思って、
subtitles.english: Since the last one was so good, I thought I'd do a second one,

subtitles.original: 企画してみたんだけど。この後はね、みんなを呼んで、
subtitles.english: and I planned this. After this, I'll call everyone,

subtitles.original: みんなと一緒に、色々ね、歌うので、
subtitles.english: and I'll be singing various songs with them, so

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひ皆様、このまま盛り上がっていくぞー！
subtitles.english: everyone, let's keep this excitement going!

subtitles.original: それでは、みんなのこと呼んでくるから、ちょっと待っててね。
subtitles.english: Now, I'm going to call them over, so please wait a moment.

subtitles.original: 今日から君の好きなところ
subtitles.english: From today, I'll tell you

subtitles.original: 1日1個伝えよう
subtitles.english: one thing I like about you every day.

subtitles.original: 365回 ドキドキさせちゃうぜ
subtitles.english: 365 times, I'll make your heart race.

subtitles.original: バッキュン！
subtitles.english: Bang!

subtitles.original: こっちにおいでよ もう
subtitles.english: Come over here already.

subtitles.original: もしかして まだ片思い？
subtitles.english: Could it be it's still one-sided?

subtitles.original: たまに甘えてくるくせに
subtitles.english: Even though you act spoiled sometimes,

subtitles.original: もしかして 転がされてる？
subtitles.english: could it be I'm being played?

subtitles.original: 一目惚れして 毎日通ってた
subtitles.english: I fell in love at first sight and came every day.

subtitles.original: 君と目が合うたびに
subtitles.english: Every time our eyes meet,

subtitles.original: 恋が爆発！
subtitles.english: my love explodes!

subtitles.original: 今日から君の好きなところ
subtitles.english: From today, I'll tell you

subtitles.original: 1日1個伝えよう
subtitles.english: one thing I like about you every day.

subtitles.original: 365回 ドキドキさせちゃうぜ
subtitles.english: 365 times, I'll make your heart race.

subtitles.original: バッキュン！
subtitles.english: Bang!

subtitles.original: ほかのコは見たり
subtitles.english: Looking at other girls?

subtitles.original: 携帯ばっか見たり
subtitles.english: Looking only at your phone?

subtitles.original: 君だけ見てるよ
subtitles.english: I'm only looking at you.

subtitles.original: えらいコのご褒美は
subtitles.english: The reward for a good boy is...

subtitles.original: チュッ！
subtitles.english: Chu!

subtitles.original: たまにはお出かけどう？
subtitles.english: How about going out once in a while?

subtitles.original: いつも部屋デートばかりじゃん
subtitles.english: We always just have dates in our rooms.

subtitles.original: もちろんそれでもいいけど
subtitles.english: Of course, that's fine too, but

subtitles.original: 僕だっておしゃれしたいし
subtitles.english: I want to dress up too.

subtitles.original: 気分屋な君に
subtitles.english: To you, who is moody...
